text: The Fragata Presidente Sarmiento is a multi-use stadium in Isidro Casanova, Argentina. It is currently used mostly for football matches and is the home ground of Almirante Brown. The stadium has a capacity of 16,200 spectators and it opened in 1969.http://www.worldstadiums.com/south_america/countries/argentina.shtml ==References== Fragata Presidente Sarmiento
title: Estadio Fragata Presidente Sarmiento
